nodes.text: Joshua Ilan Gad (born February 23, 1981) is an American actor, comedian and singer who voices the Imperial controller LT-319 in the Star Wars Rebels Season Three episode "Double Agent Droid."

At the 2017 Celebration Orlando, he hosted the The Last Jedi panel. During production of the 2017 film Murder on the Orient Express, Gad released several YouTube videos questioning co-star Daisy Ridley about The Last Jedi. In 2019, he released another such video ahead of the release of The Rise of Skywalker.
Gad is the husband of Ida Darvish, who portrayed a common house proprietor in The Mandalorian.
